extendedInfo.description: Pixel Media Controller  is DLNA compatible Digital Media Controller (DMC) and Player on Android Platform. It discovers all UPnP/DLNA compliant/certified devices from the Home Network, such as Digital Media Server (DMS), Digital Media Renderer (DMR) and Digital Media Printer (DMPr) and it helps you to control all smart devices from your Android SmartPhone and Tablet and also enable your device to play back Media Server/NAS contents at your android device locally.Pixel Media Controller (Pixel DMC) enables you to browse digital media contents from your Digital Media Server (DMS) and play them to digital media renderers (DMR) such as "dlna-compliant" Digital-TV and other "dlna-compliant" audio/video renderer devices or your devices itself using local Media Player. It also enables you to browse image content from the DMS and print at UPnP/DLNA compliant/certified Printer (DMPr). Pixel Media Controller allows you to remotely control the playback of your renderer devices, even if theyâre in a completely different area of your home. Using Pixel Media Controller, you can control volume of your TV, you can pause a media file or resume play back and it also support track change for Next media file and Previous Media file.Pixel Media Controller allows you to print an Image file (JPEG/PNG/BMP) which is reside on the remote DMS to the "dlna-compliant" Printer. It also helps you to configure your Print Job before printing to the Printer. Pixel Media Controller is one point solution on Android platform to control all "dlna-compliant" devices such as Digital TV, Mobile Phone, Printer, NAS devices and many more at your home. Feature:*	dlna compliant Digital Media Controller for Android Platform*	Discover for all dlna compliant devices â DMS, DMR, DMPr*	Support remote DMS browsing for digital media contents (Image, Song, Video)*	Select media content from DMS and Play back to DMR *	Media Playback control -  Play, Pause, Stop, Rewind and Forward, Seek (Forward, Rewind)*	Audio control for Songs and Video â Volume-Up, *	PlayResume - Stop media playback while watching and start the last played file from same location using PlayResue (PlayResume track last 10 video files).*	Select media content from DMS and Play back locally using local media player *	Image Viewer for viewing Images form DMS to locally*	Image slideshow for Local Image previewing DMS and PlayToDMR*	Audio Player for playing audio file form DMS to locally*	Continuous Audio Track Playback from DMS to LocalPlayer*	Select Image content from DMS and Print to "dlna-compliant" Printer *	Support Print, Print Cancel, Printer Event (Job-ID, Print Successful, Print Cancel etc.) for DMPr device*	Support WiFi, Tether and Ethernet for DLNA Home Network*	AlbumArt for Audio & Video*	Image Thumbnail*      UPnP/DLNA device icons as DMS and DMRPixel Media Controller (v 5.3) is tested with "dlna-compliant" leading Digital Media Server, Digital Media Renderer and Digital Media Printer and with Conformance Test Tool for this technology. Please provide your valuable feedback on Pixel Media Controller.Please have a look for our other "dlna-compliant" apps on Android platform from CMC Limited.Digital Media Server:  		 "Pixel Media Server â  DMS"Digital Media Renderer(DMR):	"Pixel Media Renderer - DMR"For any queries or issue related to Pixel Media Controller, please send e-mail toandroid@cmcltd.comWe are happy to help you.Disclaimer:This app is not DLNA certified solution and this app is not claiming that "App has passed interoperability testing standards approved, endorsed or sponsored by DLNA". This application is not certified by DLNA Organization (www.dlna.org) or its associate partner and we are not listed Member Company of this organization. DLNAÂ® is trade mark of DLNA Organization.TAG: DLNA, DMC, Media Controller, DMS, Pixel Media, DLNA Player, Video Player, Media Server, Renderer

reviews.comment: Exactly  as advertised

reviews.title: App won\'t load
reviews.comment: I used this app before and liked it, but most recent update broke it for my Transformer Prime.  App opens and then immediately closes.

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.comment: I would recommend changing the icon to something more clearly tied to its functionality, such as a picture of a remote control.

reviews.title: Galaxy Ace
reviews.comment: I just realised what it does..Very useful ...Excellent App.
reviews.author: myarchos archos

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: This works well on my Galaxy S3. I can access and instantly stream all media files on my dlna network server to the phone. No downloading required. No interruptions either.
reviews.author: Mike Butler

reviews.comment: Did exactly what I wanted it to do
reviews.author: Joey Gibson

reviews.title: Need better UI...
reviews.comment: It is somewhat difficult to use compared to Bubble upnp...
reviews.author: Eric Wong

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Can\'t create playlists Can\'t search Can\'t scroll, so if you have a big list (like most Media Servers would) you would have to click for next page instead of scroll) Interface is straight out of a 90\'s Nintendo
reviews.author: Shadi Safadi

reviews.comment: Good App.
reviews.author: Satya Pindiproli

reviews.comment: Excellent
reviews.author: Manish Gupta

reviews.title: Not bad. Needs search.
reviews.comment: It\'s not a bad app at all for accessing my media server from my phone, but the interface needs to be friendlier and a search function is desperately needed!
reviews.author: Fayyaad Hendricks

reviews.title: Well designed media controller and local dlna player
reviews.comment: I am following this app from last few releases. The latest app version realy impressed me. Introducing image slideshow and continuous audio playback realy help me and going to help others. Thanks for listening user for tracking more video files for PlayResume feature which is unique to this era. Just one request more, please provide landscape for all app screens. Hope, will see this in coming release! Keepup good works for all your dlna app on app stores.
reviews.author: Komia Natasu

reviews.title: It rocks with my setup...
reviews.comment: This new release of the app version beat other existing media controller app. Now it support continuous audio play back locally from server and also image slideshow. I like its play resume feature which now support more video files not only last played. I have checked with five files with my TV. It works well. All credit goes app developer. Thanks!
reviews.author: Rubia Posru

reviews.title: Fabulous App!
reviews.comment: Fully loaded dlna media controller app. its media controlling functionality fully compliance with my existing tv and no need my tv remote to control the box. app existing features are more advance than other existing dlna media controller app at google play store.
reviews.author: alex fargun

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Perfect to watch movies stored in the laptop to the xbox360 / TV. But it would be nice if could tether using the mobile hotspot instead of relying on another wifi connection.
reviews.author: Paulo Freixo

reviews.comment: Only managed to play single files
reviews.author: David Schmitt

reviews.title: it works perfectly with Dice and VLC
reviews.comment: App footprint is very small and it works perfectly for me. I able to play back my dlna media server contents locally with  support of Dice and VLC media player. Very good DLNA app on android platform. Thanks for the great work!
reviews.author: jhon desuza

reviews.title: Good DLNA App.
reviews.comment: I able to play back my NAS video content to my LG Smart TV using this tiny app. It helps me to control the TV from my SmartPhone, which is amazing experience for me. It discover all my devices including my Windows 7 laptop and also helps me to play back media server contents at my phone itself using VLC player. It does its job perfectly. I love this app. Well done developer!
reviews.author: mary leon
